data.message: I dont know you personally Mr. Marshall but I want to tell you something God loves you and Ive heard one of your songs that talks about the Industry,also talking about that you cant go out of something that catches you, you admit that you did a pact of the devil, but that that pact can break if you give your life to Jesus Crist, He is the only one can break with that pact to the devil,do not loosing time, Crist has come to give eternal life while the devil has come to kill, steal and destroy.
